refnamediv.refpurpose: Fetches all the headers sent by the server in response to a HTTP request

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: get_headers returns an array with the headers sent by the server in response to a HTTP request. Returns &false; on failure and an error of level E_WARNING will be issued.
If the optional format parameter is set to 1, get_headers parses the response and sets the array's keys.
